name: Notion Project Management
description: Notion Project Manager is a Notion system that allows you effectively manage and organize all your projects. With this template, you can plan and execute projects seamlessly.One of the main features of Notion Project Manager is its ability to create and customize project boards. You can create multiple boards for projects, each containing various tasks, subtasks, and deadlines. These boards allow you to track the progress of each task and set priorities.Features:Task Management - You can easily
features: Task Management- You can easily create tasks and subtasks in your project, and set deadlines. You can also track the progress of each task and mark them as completed.; Quick Action Buttons- Quick action buttons allow you to quickly add new tasks and projects with just a single click.; Project Management- Notion Project Manager offers great project management features. You can create custom project boards, set priorities,set deadlines,set categories, and track progress.; Categories- Categories provide a way to sort and organize tasks and projects. You can categorize tasks and projects based on their type or priority.; What is Notion?Notion is a powerful all-in-one workspace that allows you to create and organize notes, documents, databases, and more, making it an ideal tool for personal or team productivity.; Is Notion available on smartphones?Yes, Notion is available for both iOS and Android devices. You can download the Notion app from the App Store or Google Play Store.; How I will receive a template?After purchase, you'll receive a link to duplicate the Notion template to your workspace.; I don't have a paid account, does this still work?Yes! It works the same.
